verses.verse: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> on <S%H5401>him,<s%> and kissed him.

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> the <S%H7495>physicians,<s%> to <S%H2590>embalm<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H705>Forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> for <S%H4390>him,<s%> for that is how many the <S%H3117>days<s%> it takes to <S%H2590>embalm.<s%> The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> wept for him for <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

When the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1068>weeping<s%> for him were <S%H5674>past,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> please <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1><s%> 'My father made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H4191>dying.<s%> Bury me in my <S%H6913>grave<s%> which I have <S%H3738>dug<s%> for myself in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>" Now <S%H6912>therefore,<s%> please let me go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and I will come <S%H7725>again.<s%>'"
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> just like he made you <S%H7650>swear.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and with him went <S%H5927>up<s%> all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> Only their little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>
There went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him both <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%> It was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H4264>company.<s%>

They <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and there they <S%H5594>lamented<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3515>severe<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation.<s%> He <S%H60>mourned<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

When the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H60>mourning<s%> in the <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> by the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>" <S%H8034>Therefore,<s%> its name was <S%H7121>called<s%> Abel <S%H67>Mizraim,<s%> which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
His <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to him just as he commanded <S%H6680>them,<s%>

for his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> him into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field,<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H6085>site,<s%> from Ephron the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>â€” <S%H251>he,<s%> and his brothers, and all that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> "It may <S%H3863>be<s%> that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> will hate <S%H7852>us,<s%> and will fully <S%H7725>pay<s%> <S%H7852>us<s%> back for all of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which we did to <S%H1580>him.<s%>"
They sent a <S%H6680>message<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he <S%H4194>died,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H577><s%> 'You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "Now please <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>disobedience<s%> of <S%H577>your<s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and their <S%H6588>sin,<s%> because they <S%H1580>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to <S%H5375>you.<s%>"' Now, please forgive the disobedience of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father.<s%>" <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> when they spoke to <S%H1696>him.<s%>
His <S%H251>brothers<s%> also <S%H3212>went<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> before his <S%H6440>face;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> we are your servants."
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>them,<s%> "Don't be afraid, for am I in the place of <S%H430>God?<s%>

As for <S%H2803>you,<s%> you meant <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H430>me,<s%> but God meant <S%H2803>it<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> bring to <S%H6213>pass,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%>
Now therefore <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid. I will <S%H3557>nourish<s%> you and your little <S%H2945>ones.<s%>" He <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H1696>them,<s%> and spoke kindly to <S%H3820>them.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H1>he,<s%> and his father's <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>'s <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H8029>third<s%> <S%H1121>generation.<s%> The children also of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> were born <S%H3205>on<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "I am <S%H4191>dying,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5927>you,<s%> and bring you up out of this <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5927>you,<s%> and you shall carry up my <S%H6106>bones<s%> from <S%H2088>here.<s%>"

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and they <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> <S%H3455>him,<s%> and he was put in a <S%H727>coffin<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
